name: Mini Golf Island Max Adventure
description:
Enjoy this awesome and fun sport in your cellphone
DOWNLOAD IT TODAY -
Use your skills to go throughout extreme 4 courses, with 18 holes each of those. Spend some funny moments with Mini Golf Adventure and become the best master Golfer on AppStore ! Are you ready?
This is the best version of mini golf !
Easy to use and with perfect touch controls this game will give you hours of entertainment.
Unlock all courses and new challenges!
-Amazing fun that kids and adults can enjoy.
- Lot of levels to complete
Take a break of your day with this game.
